```{r load_packages, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# useful model of case_when and faceting
diamonds_2 <- diamonds %>% mutate(carat_fct = factor(case_when(carat < 1 ~ "small",
                                                   carat >= 1 & carat < 2 ~ "medium",
                                                   carat >= 2 ~ "large"),
                                         levels = c("small", "med", "large")))
diamonds_2 %>% ggplot(aes(x = cut, y = price)) + 
  geom_boxplot() + 
  facet_wrap(~carat_fct)
```
